features: REJUVENATE AND NOURISH - Hydrate and condition your skin with our Blushing Grapefruit & Raspberry Creme Herbal Body Moisturizer, proudly brought to you by Hempz. Keep your skin soft, smooth, and supple with our full body lotion

PURE HERBAL EXTRACTS - Every bottle is enriched with 100% Pure Natural Hemp Seed Oil, Shea Butter, Ginseng, Natural Extracts, Vitamins A, C and E, and Cucumber Extract. Providing skin care products with premium ingredients you can trust
MORE THAN JUST MOISTURIZER - Each ingredient offers you added benefits including helping calm, soothe and condition triggered oxidants. Enriching your skin with valuable vitamins and minerals

SAFE FOR ALL AGES - We pride ourselves in using high-quality ingredients to provide you with the best product possible. Our all-natural body lotion is THC-Free, Gluten Free, Paraben Free, and 100% Vegan

FRUIT SCENTED FRAGRANCE - Keep your skin hydrated and smelling great all day with our uniquely fragranced moisturizing lotion. Scented with blushing grapefruit and raspberry crème, your skin will look and smell great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells great and perfect size
reviews.reviewText: I need to have lotion on my at all times. Loved to carry this around in my purse or backpack. Smells so amazing and it’s very moisturizing without leaving a greasy feeling

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely quality lotion!!
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical about buying this lotion because of the negative reviews I read. I am so happy I did, the size is decent and honestly perfect for traveling which I do every single day. There's nothing more annoying than lugging around a 12 oz lotion with you in your purse. Aside of the good size for traveling, the scent is so refreshing. In my opinion it's more of a grapefruit than it is raspberry but it's so delicious. If you enjoy the scent sweet pea from Bath and Body Works, you'll definitely like this scent. Now to review the actual product, it is extremely moisturizing and I am a die hard lotion fanatic. I am using lotion after every single time I was my hands. My hands naturally get pretty dry especially after I do my hair every morning and expose my skin to different hair products. Even using a dime size amount was enough to fully moisturize my hands. This lotion itself is very soothing for my skin and this little bottle will definitely last me considering what little amount you need. I always saw the bigger bottles at Ulta and never purchased them because of the price and I was never able to try this brand until now. I now understand the price, its quality lotion and with such an amazing refreshing scent. Not for nothing, I received the product 2 days after I ordered it and I could not be happier!!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hempz stinks. Literally.
reviews.reviewText: So I bought the green one, the peach one, the blue one, and this one is pinkThey ALL STINK really bad, the ONLY good one is the blue one, it smells good. But the original scent tan colored one is the stinkiest of all.
